name: Full Curse Diner
description:
You built a restaurant on top of an old sailor cemetery. Because of this, some of your ingredients have been cursed with "The Cursing Curse"!

Feeding cursed food to your customers will make them tip extra, but their foul language will lower your restaurant's rating if another customer hears it.
Maximize your profits while avoiding dropping to 1 star rating!

Controls: 

Drag ingredients from the top, onto the stove. Combine two ingredients to create a new dish, and place it on a plate to serve it to your customers.

Below you'll find a list of all recipes, but don't be afraid to experiment first! 

Burger - Bread + Meat
Hotdog - Bread + Sausage
Skewer - Meat + Pepper
Stew - Carrot + Meat
Salmon Sushi - Fish + Rice
Egg Sushi - Egg + Rice
Soup - Fish + Carrot
Corn Dog - Corn + Sausage
Cereal - Corn + Milk
Cake - Egg + Milk
